creator: smwolke@geistig.com
text: Patch to add TEXT function support.  The support is not 100% compatible with the Excel function because the decimal formatting relies on the DecimalFormat class and the date formatting relies on SimpleDateFormat.  And the formatting strings have a little variance to their Excel counterparts.

Created attachment 25217
proposed patch for TEXT function
